website_summaries.verdict: Distinctly dressy boots that don't compromise on quality and comfort.
pros: Full grain leather upper in a feminine silhouette
Lace-up closure for an adjustable and secure fit
100% PET lining and footbed cover adds airiness and cushioned comfort
OrthoLite footbed makes these comfortable all day
Textured rubber heel sits atop a durable rubber lug outsole for a pleasurable walking experience
cons: Boots fit well but can be snug

customer_reviews.title: Loveee
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I've gotten many compliments two days into wearing them. I ordered a 7 and they fit perfect. Only thing that annoys me is taking them off and loosening the laces! Lol but otherwise that, I love these and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovejpm

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Quality
customer_reviews.text: These boots are absolutely the best. They are sturdy- the heel and bottoms are made of very touch rubber. The tall heels will not be getting scratched up at all by knocking it on something. They are comfy - the soles are so soft and feels great while walking. The ankles are also great for people with small ankles (ME!). They fits super snug. These are my new go-to black ankle boots. So good!
customer_reviews.author: Uhnot

customer_reviews.title: Correct heel measurement is 3.5" with 0.5" platform
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews on the many different heel heights, I would like to confirm, after careful measurement, that it is 3.5" with 0.5" platform. This is my first high heeled Timberland. The boot is well made and the design and fit are fine but not jaw droppingly awesome. It's good value for money (paid under $80 plus additional shipping). The front is a little too rounded to be chic but then, it's a brand that's synonymous with outdoors and ruggedness so that's what one gets but with heels. I'll try the wedge heels next.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: They are tight when you first get them.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Timberland's! They were a little snug when I first put them on but the more I walked in them the more they felt right. So just be mindful when you get your pair they might be a little tight at first he used need to wear them a timer to. They were a little snug when I first put them on but the more I walked in them the more they felt right. So just be mindful when you get your repair they might be a little tight at first he used need to wear them a timer to
customer_reviews.author: Dar H

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and good for any season
customer_reviews.text: Comfy! Can wear for about 5 hours without foot pain, maybe longer if you didn't live in a city with a lot of walking, but for me at least those 5 hours include a lot of walking. Tons of compliments and the thick heel has a lot of shock absorption. Versatile and good for any season.
customer_reviews.author: Pandadachs

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a large stain on the right shoe hopefully I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes last week in a exceptionally timely manner but because I was leaving town the day my package was delivered I wasn’t able to open it until last night. I wanted to try them on but when I opens the boxed and pulled them out I was supposed to see that 1 of the shoes had a defect. It looks like a large stain on the right shoe hopefully I can exchange them for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Pair of Boots!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about my Timbs! I love these boots. They are cute, look good on my feet and I can do everything in them. Some boots hurt your feet after a while, but not these. They are worth the price because the quality is superb. Will definitely buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Shawny

customer_reviews.title: Love Them 😍
customer_reviews.text: The size was good, a perfect fit .no need to up or down a size. 😍 Love them. comfortable. I will spray them before I wear them again. so they will not get stained after all it is a boot. I look too cute in them, if I say so myself..oh I just did 😉
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: I love them 😍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them, even though I found a seller cheaper afterwards. However, I will not return them because they are wonderful, and they came when I was told it would! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: tutu

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots as far as the overall appearance and fit. They are a little stiff and the heel is closer to 4", rather than the stated 3" in the description. I gotten many compliments, especially from guys!
customer_reviews.author: Tippy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these so comfortable, there is a little extra room right at the top of the foot, but is fixed with a little thicker of a sock. But it could be just my foot. As far as the size 10 it fits, love these.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: True to size, comfortable & trendy...
customer_reviews.text: It’s true to size, comfortable, soft inside, versatile & trendy. I love my timbs...
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe greater deal
customer_reviews.text: Have been eyeing these for a while, ever since I saw Megan Fox where them in TMNT.I am in love they are REALLY comfortable and the fact that they retail for $125+ and I found them for only $70 makes the purchase even better. But if I had paid full price it still would have been worth it. Ladies get them.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: I suggest buy your true size
customer_reviews.text: I bought my true size. A little snug in the toes. I would not suggest ordering a size up because I read that suede shoes will stretch naturally. I put on a pair of thick socks and walked around the house for about 2 hours and they were fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: EHL

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: What a classy look. Comfortable despite the heel height. Nice, grippable rubber sole. Daughter is already wearing them even though it's 90 outside. She loves them. Exactly what you expect from Timberland as far as quality.
customer_reviews.author: sidskymom

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth paying for this kind of quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots! tried to go with a similar, no name brand version before as these are just kind of pricy, but ended up returning the cheap ones and buying these anyway. They loo great, go with everything and are very comfortable! and I don't wear a lot of heels, so that definitely says something.
customer_reviews.author: Dorit Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Beyond satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have never felt comfortable ordering shoes online as I am flat footed and like to try them on first. But I was in love with these boots and gave it a whirl. Totally satisfied and they fit perfectly. I was able to wear them all day during a family function without achy feet. The heel is the perfect height and my foot doesn't slide down to make it uncomfortable. Recommended for sure!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but I had to return them
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute but very uncomfortable for me. I have flat feet tho. Maybe that’s why

customer_reviews.title: ♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️♥️

customer_reviews.title: ... on the reviews I sized down and they fit perfect. I find the boots cute but extremely stiff ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I sized down and they fit perfect. I find the boots cute but extremely stiff and not comfortable. So much so that I hardly wear them. I mean these hurt like immediately upon wearing. So that's never a good thing. Especially when the boots look deceivingly like it Should be confutable. I would recommend these for this reason. Still cute though.

I feel i need to obtain more females to share the joy. thank you amazon

Kind of reminds me of a glammed up construction worker boot. 5 star she's happy so I'm happy

product_meta.title: Timberland Women's Earthkeepers Glancy 6" Boot
product_meta.description: Heel height is 3 inches; shaft height is 5.5 inches
feature_bullets: Electrify your sweet ensemble with the Earthkeepers® Glancy 6" Boot from Timberland®.
Full grain leather upper in a feminine silhouette.
Lace-up closure for an adjustable and secure fit.
100% PET lining and footbed cover for breathability and cushioned comfort.

OrthoLite® footbed for all-day wear. Textured rubber heel sits atop a durable rubber lug outsole for a pleasurable walking experience. Imported. Measurements: Heel Height: 3 1⁄4 in Weight: 1 lb Shaft: 7 1⁄2 in Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
